entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 15.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
